definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)

sentences.english: View build history and build status directly in Mingle.
sentences.chinese: 在Mingle中直接觀看構建歷史與構建狀態。

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人觀看了在足球城體育場舉行的世界盃決賽。

sentences.english: This mirrors the situation when we are watching a public figure apologizing.
sentences.chinese: 這反映了我們觀看一個公衆人物道歉時的狀態。

sentences.english: It is difficult for us to refrain from laughing when we are seeing a comedy.
sentences.chinese: 在我們觀看喜劇時，很難忍住不笑。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的觀看與支持，你是指滑雪還是越南河粉？

sentences.english: The river banks were lined with people watching the boat race.
sentences.chinese: 河兩岸站滿了觀看賽船的人羣。

sentences.english: We watched a performance which included a puppet show and acrobatics .
sentences.chinese: 我們觀看了一場演出，內容有木偶戲和雜技。

sentences.english: Viewers around the world can catch a live webcast of the sold-out event in New York.
sentences.chinese: 全球的讀者可通過網路來觀看這一討論的現場情況。

sentences.english: The performances were really a big hit and drew in large crowds.
sentences.chinese: 表演太成功了，很多人都慕名而來觀看。

sentences.english: It is not that people are watching less television.
sentences.chinese: 原因並非人們觀看電視的時間減少了。

sentences.english: Programme is recommended for S. 4 or above students.
sentences.chinese: 節目適合中四或以上學生觀看。

sentences.english: The wedding of Prince Edouard and his bride was a far more low-key affair however with only a few hundred people turning out onto the streets to watch them.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華王子的婚禮低調得多，僅有幾百人沿街觀看。

sentences.english: Young Hercules Watch online for free.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的大力士在線觀看免費。

sentences.english: He sauntered along Oxford Street looking at the shopwindows.
sentences.chinese: 他沿牛津街漫步觀看商店的櫥窗。

sentences.english: His father sits in the corner, watching, but the boy is no more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 他的父親坐在角落裏觀看，但男孩不再感到舒適。

sentences.english: And it's said that the king may be coming to the team's game.
sentences.chinese: 而且據說國王可能會來觀看挪威隊的比賽。

definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
